com.tokelon.toktales.core.render.texture

Interface ITextureManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTextureManager

    public interface ITextureManager
    Manages the loading of textures to the GPU.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addLoadedTexture(ITexture texture, int location)
      Adds the given texture to this manager as externally loaded.
      boolean addTexture(ITexture texture)
      Adds the given texture to this manager.
      int getLoadedTextureCount() 
      int getManagingTextureIndex()
      Returns the index of the texture unit that will be used to manage textures.
      int getTextureCount() 
      ITextureDriver getTextureDriver() 
      int getTextureLocation(ITexture texture)
      Returns the location of the given texture on the GPU.
      boolean hasTexture(ITexture texture)
      Returns whether the given texture is managed by this manager.
      boolean hasTextureLoaded(ITexture texture)
      Returns whether the given texture has been loaded by this manager.
      boolean loadTexture(ITexture texture)
      Loads the given texture onto the GPU.
      void removeAll()
      Removes all textures from this manager.
      boolean removeLoadedTexture(ITexture texture)
      Removes the given texture from this manager as externally unloaded.
      boolean removeTexture(ITexture texture)
      Removes the given texture from this manager.
      void unloadAll()
      Unloads all textures of this manager.
      boolean unloadTexture(ITexture texture)
      Unloads the given texture from the GPU.

    • Method Detail

      • getTextureDriver

        ITextureDriver getTextureDriver()
        Returns:
        The texture driver for this manager.

      • getManagingTextureIndex

        int getManagingTextureIndex()
        Returns the index of the texture unit that will be used to manage textures.
        Returns:
        An index for a texture unit.

      • getTextureCount

        int getTextureCount()
        Returns:
        The current number of textures managed by this manager.

      • getLoadedTextureCount

        int getLoadedTextureCount()
        Returns:
        The current number of textures loaded on the GPU by this manager.

      • addTexture

        boolean addTexture(ITexture texture)
        Adds the given texture to this manager.

        If the texture is already managed by this manager, there will be no effect.

        Parameters:
        texture - The texture to add.
        Returns:
        True if the texture was added, false if it was already managed by this manager.

      • addLoadedTexture

        boolean addLoadedTexture(ITexture texture,
                         int location)
        Adds the given texture to this manager as externally loaded.

        The texture manager will assume that the texture is loaded at the given location.
        No calls to the GPU will be made.

        If the texture is already loaded by this manager, there will be no effect.

        Parameters:
        texture - The texture to add.
        location - The location of the loaded texture on the GPU.
        Returns:
        True if the texture was added, false if it was already managed by this manager.

      • loadTexture

        boolean loadTexture(ITexture texture)
        Loads the given texture onto the GPU.

        If the texture is not managed by this manager, it will added in the same way as if addTexture(ITexture) had been called before.

        If the texture is already loaded by this manager, there will be no effect.

        Parameters:
        texture - The texture to load.
        Returns:
        True if the texture was loaded, false if it was already loaded by this manager.

      • hasTexture

        boolean hasTexture(ITexture texture)
        Returns whether the given texture is managed by this manager.
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture that should be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the texture is managed, false if not.

      • hasTextureLoaded

        boolean hasTextureLoaded(ITexture texture)
        Returns whether the given texture has been loaded by this manager.
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture that should be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the texture is loaded, false if not.

      • getTextureLocation

        int getTextureLocation(ITexture texture)
        Returns the location of the given texture on the GPU.
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture of which the location should be returned.
        Returns:
        A texture location, or -1 if the texture is not loaded by this manager.

      • removeTexture

        boolean removeTexture(ITexture texture)
        Removes the given texture from this manager.

        If the texture is loaded by this manager, it will be unloaded.

        If the texture is not managed by this manager, there will be no effect.

        Parameters:
        texture - The texture that should be removed.
        Returns:
        True if the texture was managed, false if not.

      • removeLoadedTexture

        boolean removeLoadedTexture(ITexture texture)
        Removes the given texture from this manager as externally unloaded.

        The manager will assume that the texture is unloaded.
        No calls to the GPU will be made.

        If the texture is not managed by this manager, there will be no effect.

        Parameters:
        texture - The texture that should be removed.
        Returns:
        True if the texture was managed, false if not.

      • unloadTexture

        boolean unloadTexture(ITexture texture)
        Unloads the given texture from the GPU.

        If the texture is not loaded by this manager, there will be no effect.

        Parameters:
        texture - The texture that should be unloaded.
        Returns:
        True if the texture was loaded, false if not.

      • removeAll

        void removeAll()
        Removes all textures from this manager.

        Any loaded textures will be unloaded in the process.

      • unloadAll

        void unloadAll()
        Unloads all textures of this manager.
